long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Docs Dark Theme (Pure CSS Injection)

Tired of straining your eyes while working on Google Docs at night? This simple utility injects a sleek dark theme CSS into your Google Docs pages, making your editing experience more comfortable.

Highlights:

- System Preference Integration: The extension respects your system's dark/light settings, ensuring that your Google Docs pages only switch to dark mode when you want them to.
- Immediate Dark Background: The <html> element is marked as black, preventing the harsh flash of a blank white screen when you open your documents for the first time.
- Safe and Lightweight: This extension is purely CSS-basedâ€”there's no JavaScript involved. It's super safe and requires no extra permissions! (less than 10KB)
